name: hkgolden Compact
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document
url-prefix("http://forum1.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum1.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum1.hkgolden.com/search"),
url-prefix("http://forum2.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum2.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum2.hkgolden.com/search"),
url-prefix("http://forum3.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum3.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum3.hkgolden.com/search"),
url-prefix("http://forum4.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum4.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum4.hkgolden.com/search"),
url-prefix("http://forum5.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum5.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum5.hkgolden.com/search"),
url-prefix("http://forum6.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum6.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum6.hkgolden.com/search"),
url-prefix("http://forum7.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum7.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum7.hkgolden.com/search"),
url-prefix("http://forum8.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum8.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum8.hkgolden.com/search"),
url-prefix("http://forum9.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum9.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum9.hkgolden.com/search"),
url-prefix("http://forum10.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum10.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum10.hkgolden.com/search"),
url-prefix("http://forum11.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum11.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum11.hkgolden.com/search"),
url-prefix("http://forum12.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum12.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum12.hkgolden.com/search"),
url-prefix("http://forum101.hkgolden.com/topics"),
url-prefix("http://forum101.hkgolden.com/view"),
url-prefix("http://forum101.hkgolden.com/search") {


div.TopMenuPanel,
img[src="/images/menutop.gif"],
div.MenuPanel,
div.PageMiddleFunctions,
div.DivResizableBoxContainer,
td[height="52"],
div[style="background-color: #F3F2F1; height: 58px;"],
div.FooterPanel,
span#MainPageAd1,
span#MainPageAd2,
span#MiddlePageAd1 { display: none; }
div#MiddlePageAd1 { visibility: hidden; height: 0px; }
div.PageMiddleBox { background-image: none !important; }
div.ContentPanel { margin-top: -50px !important; }
div.Topic_FunctionPanel { margin-top: -10px !important; }
img { width: auto !important; height: auto !important; }
a:link { text-decoration: none; }


}
